Product Title: Cellulite Massager Brush Mitt Bundle with Roller Massager from SHESSENTIALS with Deep Massage Technology to GET RID OF CELLULITE, Accelerate Body Firming and Tightening for use on Legs Arms Belly Thighs Hips
Review Date: 2015/06/13
Store: Shessentials
Product Description: ['Is Your Cellulite Forcing Your Body Into Hiding?', "Do you suffer from unsightly cellulite?Do you avoid the beach or pool because you're embarrassed of your cellulite?Feel uncomfortable with your clothes off?If you're like 90% of all women, then the answer is yes. Cellulite doesn't discriminate, it affects millions of women of all ages and body types.", "What Can Shessentials' Cellulite Massager Do For Me?", '✓', 'Regain Your Self Confidence', '- Stop worrying about people looking and feel confident in any outfit!✓', 'Wear The Clothes You Want', '- Wear bikinis, short shorts, and anything else you want without embarrassment!✓', 'Get The Attention of Your Partner', "- Your man won't be able to resist your new cellulite-free thighs and butt!", 'What Makes Our Cellulite Massager Different from the rest?', '✓ Includes BONUS Roller Massager with 28 Deep Massage Point Technology that re-activates cellular activity by mechanically stimulating your skin✓ Convenient design that lasts for years, and allows for a wide variety of different application positions✓ Patented body slimming massage tips that increases blood flow and tightens, tones, and restores the appearance of your skin', 'Make Your Friends Beg For Your Secret', "Women from all over the world are using this massager with miraculous results. Just in case this sounds too good to be true, we're backing it with an unconditional lifetime money back guarantee. We're taking all the risk from you!", 'For less than the price of a steak dinner, your results are guaranteed. You have nothing to lose!', 'Order Now with our Cellulite Cream and GET RID OF YOUR CELLULITE', "before we're out of stock!"]
Average Rating: 3.6

Product Title: Fifth & Skin Age Defying Face Serum - BIG 2 OZ. - Hyaluronic Acid with Vitamin C - Vegan Moisturizer - Antiaging Face Serum - Plump Fine Lines - Serum for Aging Skin

Review Text: I received this only a few days ago.  I started using this day and night for the past couple of days and find this has a very nice texture and makes your skin very soft and smooth.  I feel it's a great buy as I believe this is a quality product.  This comes in a nice pump bottle and was surprised of the amount it contained.  I do think over time that there will be cumulative effect which will be more visible.  At this point, it's really a nice product.  I have ultra sensitive skin and found I got no allergic reaction from this as well
Review Title: A Great Product!  You won't be sorry......
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bed Head Curve Check Curling Wand for Tousled Waves and Texture, Jumbo Barrel
Review Date: 2019/02/27
Store: Bed Head
Product Description: ['TOUSLED WAVES AND TEMPTING TEXTURE. Give your hair big and beautiful, wavy texture with the Bed Head Curve Check Tourmaline Ceramic Styling Iron. This easy-to-use wand will have you turning heads in tousled, touchable texture. The unique, bead-shaped barrel was designed for versatility to deliver different types of texture-- loose tousled curls AND waves. High Heat up to 400° F quickly locks in the curl with a clamp-free wrap-and-go design that leaves no creases behind and a natural-looking finish. Tourmaline Ceramic helps to reduce frizz and lock in shine for amazing body throughout. The Bed Head Curve Check Tourmaline Ceramic Styling Iron also comes with a Bonus Heat-protective Glove and a Tangle-Free Swivel Cord that make it easy to style with. Dual Voltage for worldwide use means you can take this baby with you anywhere you go. HOW IT WORKS: Wrap a 1"" section of hair around the barrel leaving the ends out. For looser curls, wrap the hair around the balls of the barrel, or in-between for tighter curls. HOW IT WORKS: Wrap a 1"" section of hair around the barrel leaving the ends out. For looser curls, wrap the hair around the balls of the barrel, or in-between for tighter curls. Clamp free wrap and go design']
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand Name': 'Bed Head', 'Model Info': 'BH335CF', 'Item Weight': '1 pounds', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 4.5 x 15.88 inches', 'Country of Origin': 'China', 'Item model number': 'BH335CF', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Part Number': 'BH335CF', 'Color': 'Pink', 'Voltage': '240 Volts', 'Material Type': 'Ceramic', 'Batteries Included?': 'No', 'Batteries Required?': 'No', 'Domestic Shipping': 'Item can be shipped within U.S.', 'International Shipping': 'This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.  Learn More', 'Date First Available': 'January 8, 2014', 'Shape': 'Barrel', 'Brand': 'Bed Head', 'Hair Type': 'Waves,Frizz', 'Material': 'Ceramic'}
Review Text: Don't you just hate when part of your curly hair just goes straight?  This is great for tweaking that hair without having to do your whole head.
Review Title: Great for naturally curly hair
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has highlighted several positive experiences with the skincare products, emphasizing their effectiveness and quality. Many items received high ratings, particularly for their relaxing textures and impressive moisturizing properties. Users expressed satisfaction with the ability to improve skin texture, softness, and overall appearance, noting that these products often deliver on their promises. Additionally, the user appreciated the longevity of some items, particularly soap which has been a favorite for years. Also, there was a positive response towards the hair styling product for its ability to enhance natural curls without extensive effort.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
While there were generally positive experiences, some products received mixed reviews. Users expressed dissatisfaction with specific items that did not meet their expectations. For instance, a hair accessory was found to be less effective than alternatives, leading to disappointment. The overall performance of a few products was considered underwhelming, indicating that not all items successfully delivered the desired results or convenience as expected. 

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping behavior showcases a blend of positive and negative experiences. They have had notable successes with skincare and hair products that enhance beauty and confidence, receiving high ratings for their effectiveness and quality. However, some items did not fully satisfy their needs, particularly in the accessory category, leading to less favorable assessments. This suggests a discerning shopper who values quality and effectiveness while also providing constructive feedback on less satisfying purchases.

target_interaction.title: This does not brush your hair or go through to your scalp
target_interaction.text: I'm very surprised at the high ratings of this brush..  Yes....it is made well....the shape is perfect - the handle feels good in your hand - but......the bristles glide OVER your hair - and not through it.  It doesn't touch my scalp and I have shoulder length hair.  Maybe if your a male with very short hair it would be ok - but this does not stimulate the scalp at all. - nor will it go through my layers of fine hair.  I only used it once and would like to return - not sure if I can.
target_interaction.title_meta: GranNaturals Boar Bristle Smoothing Hair Brush for Women and Men - Medium/Soft Bristles - Natural Wooden Large Flat Square Paddle Hairbrush for Fine, Thin, Straight, Long, or Short Hair
features: REDUCE FRIZZ: As you brush, oils from your hair are spread around to lubricate each hair strand
STIMULATES SCALP: Brushing your hair with boar bristles massages the scalp and stimulates blood flow
PREVENTS OIL BUILD-UP: Boar bristle brushes help to distribute oil from your roots to your ends.
NATURALLY CONDITIONS HAIR: The oil that is spread helps to repair dry hair and adds volume and shine.
LOVE IT OR YOUR MONEY BACK: Not 110% thrilled with your purchase? Let us know and we’ll make it right!
